Class HCModel

java.lang.Object
heparansulfate.HCModel
public class HCModel extends Object
Homogeneous Markov model of species (chain sequence) abundances (model H&C). Field this.g contains the expected fragment length distribution after digestion by one heparinase.

  • Constructor Details

    • HCModel

      public HCModel(int n, BBSet bbs, CSpec cs, double[][] tp, int lm)
      Homogeneous Markov model of species (chain sequence) abundances (model H&C). Field this.g contains the expected fragment length distribution after digestion by one heparinase.
      Parameters:
      n - BKHS chain length.
      bbs - Disaccharides and their overall proportions.
      cs - Cleavage specificities/yields for one heparinase.
      tp - Initial matrix of transition probabilities (random or already optimized) which is then projected to satisfy constraints: output in this.P.
      lm - Maximum fragment length.

  • Method Details

    • toVector

      public static double[] toVector(double[][] P)
      Returns a vector version of matrix P.
      Parameters:
      P - Matrix of transition probabilities.
      Returns:
      A vector version of matrix P.

    • toMatrix

      public static double[][] toMatrix(int m, double[] p)
      Returns a matrix version of vector p.
      Parameters:
      m - Number of rows/columns.
      p - Vector.
      Returns:
      A m by m matrix version of vector p.
